p: HaCaT cells were seeded in 6 well plate at density of 1.5 X 10 5 cells moreover treated with increasing concentrations of Eczegone (10 ng/mL-100 μg/mL) pursued by incubation for 24 hour at 37°C temperature. Afterward the cells were observed under microscope and pictures were taken to see if there is any morphological changes with the aforementioned drug.
